rules_text:
Whenever World of Metal enters or you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 colorless Drone artifact creature token, then put a +1/+1 counter on each Drone you control.
{2}{U}{U}, Discard World of Metal: Create a 1/1 colorless Drone artifact creature token with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of noncreature cards not named World of Metal in your graveyard.
